citeinfo.origin: USDA Forest Service, Alaska Department of Natural Resources, Division of Support Services-Land Records Information Section
citeinfo.title: Historical Transportation Routes

descript.abstract: Data Type: Infrastructure ; This statewide database depicts historical use trails that qualify as potential right-of-ways under the Federal Revised Statute 2477. This data reflects an extensive land ownership search of over 1200 historical trails evaluating each trail according to regulations of RS 2477. The intended use of this dataset is to provide a tool for the state's use to meet public access needs.

idinfo.accconst: Requestor must complete GIS Starter Kit Data Agreement stating Terms and Conditions for use of Starter Kit Data.
idinfo.useconst: DNR does not recommend use of this data at a larger scale. Greater detail for each layer is provided from DNR, Land Records Information Section, for each data module upon receipt of order.

distinfo.distliab: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system. NOAA makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty.
